name: Flot
description:
Grab your oars and get ready for an intense couch multiplayer experience like no other. Team up with a friend and take down your opponents raft before they sink yours. 

Use your paddles to steer while bombarding your enemies with arrows and explosive barrels. FLOT takes you on a thrilling journey down a procedurally generated river full of hazards and surprises. Do you have what it takes to lead your team to victory?

FLOT includes: 
● Multiplayer action for 2 - 4 players
● Paddles
● Bows
● An infinite supply of explosive barrels

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FLOT is a student project made in 4 weeks at Futuregames Higher Vocational Educations in Stockholm, Sweden. The team included Marcus Quarfordt, Lovisa Gibson, André Castman, Sebastian Flores, Mahad Nur, Philip Rothman, Rickard Dahlberg, Edward Sedelius, Jonathan Antonsson, Leon Andersson, Leonard Fahlström and Johannes Kemppainen
